name: Mouth Off
description:
Note: If you are trying to play this in a browser, make sure you use a Chromium-based browser (such as Chrome or Edge) because Godot 4 exports only work on Chromium-based browsers on itch.io at the moment. Thank you for your understanding.

This is my submission for Godot Wild Jam 54 ("Curses"). I used Godot 4 RC1.

Controls:

  • Spacebar - jump
  • A - fire a gun/cannon
  • S - fire a cannon
  • D - fire a cannon
  • F - advance to the boss level in the explanation screen

Art Assets:

  • 0x72 (https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-pirates-tileset)
  • chierit (https://chierit.itch.io/boss-demon-slime)
  • Donut Studio (https://donut-studio.itch.io/pixel-crosshaires)
  • matheus33 (https://opengameart.org/content/night-at-sea)

Audio Assets:

  • alkakrab (https://alkakrab.itch.io/free-pirate-game-music-pack)
  • Leohpaz (https://leohpaz.itch.io/rpg-essentials-sfx-free)
  • Michael Bardari (https://opengameart.org/content/2-high-quality-explosions)
  • Luke.RUSTLTD (https://opengameart.org/content/10-8bit-coin-sounds)
  • unicaegames (https://opengameart.org/content/keyboard-soundpack-1-typing-and-single-keystroke...)
  • Prunus Productions (https://prunusproductions.itch.io/gun-sound-pack)
  • SnakeF8 (https://f8studios.itch.io/snakes-second-authentic-gun-sounds-pack)
